#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Penalty.

== Name ==

Penalty (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Penalty (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type used to record penalty stroke and help identify the reason of the penalty.
			An optional rule attribute can be used to store the rule breached.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...  rule = xs:string>positiveInteger</...>
}}}
----
          

=== Attribute Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || `rule` ||  Rule number indicating the violation. ||

=== Attribute Detail ===
      

==== rule ====

      
						Rule number indicating the violation.
						Example: rule="USGA:26-1/19:Water Hazard"
					
=====  Type: =====

          xs:string
=====  Use: =====
        optional
=====  Form: =====
		unqualified
----
  

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoleScore HoleScore], [CRoundSummary RoundSummary]
----
    
----
